messages.body: $TSLA 4 Tessa's stolen in Slc a bizarre chain of events lead to their capture lol http://www.sltrib.com/news/2017/11/24/four-stolen-teslas-recovered-friday-in-apparent-coordinated-theft-from-utah-dealership/

links.title: Four stolen Teslas recovered Friday in apparent coordinated theft from Utah dealership
links.description: Various police agencies coordinated to recover four Teslas stolen from a showroom on State Street in South Salt Lake on Friday, in what appears to be a coordinated theft. At least two of the suspects claimed to have the vehicles because they are part of the Tesla family.

links.title: CES 2017: Nvidia and Audi Say They'll Field a Level 4 Autonomous Car in Three Years
links.description: Jen-Hsun Huang, the CEO of Nvidia, said last night in Las Vegas that his company and Audi are developing a self-driving car that will finally be worthy of the name. That autonomous vehicle, he said, will be on the roads by 2020. Huang made his remarks in a keynote address at CES.

source.name: IEEE Spectrum: Technology, Engineering, and Science News

links.title: VW engineer sentenced to 40-month prison term in diesel case
links.description: A federal judge in Detroit sentenced former engineer James Liang to 40 months in prison on Friday for his role in Volkswagen AG's (VOWG_p.DE) multiyear scheme to sell diesel cars that generated more pollution than U.S. clean air rules allowed.
